Reviews.Title: Kenwood 10 inch shallow sub
Reviews.Author: Pete
Reviews.Content: I have this hooked up in my single cab truck behind my seat in a sealed box.  It's wired to the class D kenwood excelon monoblock amp that is 300 watts rms at 4 ohms and it stomps!!  My side mirrors shake and my rearview mirror goes crazy!  I have had this in for almost 2 months now without any problems at all.

Reviews.Title: kenwood excelon
Reviews.Author: Antony Shane Davenport
Reviews.Content: These are great for small spaces, or if you do not have a lot of cubic ft for an enclosure.

Reviews.Title: Custom made box + Regular Cab Tacoma + Kenwood  10" shallow
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Custom made box + Regular Cab Tacoma + Kenwood  10" shallow sub = Bass Bliss<---> Hitting hard for what it is.....allows my seat all the way back and rumbles me out the cab, Good Sub, Good price cant go wrong kenwood .... only Sub in this price range (90$) I'd consider....

Reviews.Title: Eh...
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: Leaves a lot to be desired. Built ported box to specs and was unimpressed with the output. Designed two different boxes for it from there, one smaller and one larger and still the sub was not very impressive. Would definitely consider other options!

Reviews.Title: Great sub hits hard!!!!
Reviews.Author: boomer93
Reviews.Content: This is just an awesome sub great price and hits a lot harder than I expected. I had to build my own box for my single cab truck but paired with a kenwood mono x500-1 amp the sub really hits. I wish I could give is 6 stars would recommend this to anyone that wants a great sounding sub at a petty reasonable price

Reviews.Title: Sound better than I thought they would for being so slim.
Reviews.Author: CaddyMan
Reviews.Content: These sound amazing and loud for being so slim. Also thier super durable and I havent had any problems with them since I got them. Definitly the best Slim Subwoofer for the money.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING SHALLOW MOUNT
Reviews.Author: mgtymouse1123
Reviews.Content: This is probably the best shallow mount sub I have ever seen and heard! Very durable construction with a carbon fiber cone is heavy duty! If setup with clean power sounds better then many 12" subs Ive listened too. Overall great product! [...]

Reviews.Title: nice little sub
Reviews.Author: uncle
Reviews.Content: nice small sub just what i needed to put into my truck box.powered by 170watts rms and it sounds pretty good,nice little thump in a sealed enclosurewould recommend for musical bass

Reviews.Title: A lot of boom for not a lot of money
Reviews.Author: The ROK
Reviews.Content: I built a custom fiberglass box, using the manufactures specs for my Nissan Altima and I was impressed, after the break in, month or so, I was even more impressed.  I value my trunk space, this thing fires from just .75 cu feet box that fits snug in the little pocket on the left side of an 05 Altima.  I only had 250 watts of Rockford power running to it and it was more bass than I needed.  Nice clean design.

Reviews.Title: Great sound in a tight places
Reviews.Author: Jeff Mick
Reviews.Content: At the time it was the shallowest sub I could get and it barely fit in my application, but it sounds great.
